attributes.action: Review the rules that govern the house of commons dialouge, and if needed amend them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a British citizen I am regularly affronted in front of the international community by the way our Ministers of Parliament treat each other in public discussion and PMQ's.

I am not clear on the guidelines that govern discussion, but when it boils down to plain insults and jokes, shows nothing more than a mockery of our government, degrading into a rabble.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
